availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Ruth S. Penn Stovall in Christian County, Kentucky, on September 25, 1835. Father of George Stovall, William P. Stovall, Joseph B. Stovall, Thomas J. Stovall, Mary E. Stovall, Lucinda Stovall, and John Stovall. Farmer in Ballard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, p. 292A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Blandville District, p. 20.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, District 8, p. 20.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Christian County Marriages, Film #001942963, p. 130-131.
Federal Mortality Census Schedules, 1850-1880, and Related Indexes, 1850-1880, NARA RG, Microfilm Series T655, Roll 15, Ballard County, Kentucky, 1869, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
